title: GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto - Lightweight, Powerful Pro Salon Blow Dryer with Diffuser & 2 Concentrator Nozzle Attachment Tools (Under 1LB)
descriptions:
Introducing the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto, your ultimate solution for professional hair drying at home!

**Product Details:**

- **Weight**: Packs a powerful punch while staying lightweight, at under 1LB.
- **Performance**: Delivers a drying speed that's 30% faster than other dryers, thanks to its 1700W motor power. The motor speed is seven times faster than traditional hair dryers, ensuring quick and efficient drying.
- **Design**: Available in sleek and stylish color options, including Silver and Black, the IQ Perfetto boasts an ergonomic design that not only looks great but also feels comfortable to use. It features Oxy Active Technology for a healthier hair drying experience.
- **Attachments**: Comes with a diffuser and two concentrator nozzles, offering versatile styling options.
- **Features**: Equipped with an innovative microfilter to prevent tiny dirt particles from damaging the motor, and an auto-clean technology for easy maintenance. The LED memory configuration offers 18 settings, displayed on an LED display for easy viewing. It also features auto-diagnosis for any potential issues.

Experience the power and precision of the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto, and achieve professional results in the comfort of your own home.
